Punch.help: A Super Strength Punch is a powerful pummeling attack, and it may knock foes off their feet.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Haymaker.help: The Haymaker is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a greater damage and a high chance of Knockback.

Tremor.help: A tremendous attack. Tremor shakes the very Earth itself, damaging and knocking back everything in a nearby area.

Stone_Spears.help: The Caster can cause Stone Spears to erupt around an enemy target and all nearby foes. The Stone Spears deal moderate lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Seismic_Smash.help: You have been Knocked out and rendered helpless by Atta's Seismic Smash.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Hurl_Boulder.help: The Troll can rip a Boulder out of the ground and Hurl it a short distance. The Hurled Boulder deals medium damage and can Knockback foes.

Fast_Healing.help: The Troll naturally heals at a faster than a normal rate. This power is always on and does not need to activated.

Temp_Invulnerability.help: When you activate this power, you become highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal damage for a short duration. Recharge: Very Long
